about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Helping you discover the magic of Cappadocia
about.ourStoryText: Paphlagonia Tour was founded by Shahin Ahmet in Antalya in 2014 as an adventure and nature sports agency, and opened its 3rd branch in Safranbolu in 2016 and Cappadocia in 2020, increasing its emphasis on seejour and incoming tours. Today, Paphlagonia Tour continues its operations in Safranbolu, Amasra, Istanbul, Antalya and Cappadocia; It pays special attention to Sustainable Tourism, Safe Tourism and nature tourism.
about.ourMissionText: To provide the highest quality tours while preserving Cappadocia's natural and cultural heritage, and to create special, safe, and unforgettable experiences for every guest.
about.experienceDesc: 15+ years of tourism experience showcasing Cappadocia at its best
about.safetyDesc: We apply the highest safety standards in all our tours
about.guidesDesc: Expert, experienced, and passionate local guides
about.satisfactionDesc: 4.9/5 average rating and thousands of happy guests
about.teamText: We are a team passionate about Cappadocia, who love hospitality and do their work in the best way possible.

kvkk.title: Personal Data Protection Authority (KVKK)
kvkk.subtitle: Clarification Text
kvkk.section1Text1: By becoming a member, you accept the User Agreement and Privacy Policy.
kvkk.section1Text2: Members are deemed to have accepted the sharing and storage of their data with Paphlagonia group companies.
kvkk.section1Text3: Personal data includes identity, contact, location, IP and membership information.
kvkk.section1Text4: Sensitive personal data is not collected or processed.
kvkk.section3Title: 3. Data Collection Method and Legal Grounds
kvkk.section3Text1: Data is collected via websites, mobile apps, call centers and cookies.
kvkk.section3Text2: Processing is based on legal obligations and contract performance.
kvkk.section4Text1: Personal data is not shared without consent.
kvkk.section4Text2: It may be shared with public institutions when legally required.
kvkk.section4Text3: It may be transferred to service partners in a limited manner.
kvkk.section5Text1: Learning whether your data is processed
